src:
恬娃改口挺韓國瑜！　惹惱曾馨瑩堂哥痛哭「我被踢出郭家軍」
03 Nov 2019, 03:48 by 網路創意組, 攝影組
曾經是超級郭粉，還主動說要拍全裸寫真助選的資深女星恬娃跳船了，她為了郭台銘多次公開痛罵韓國瑜，還上節目放話「他選上我頭剁下來」，不料隨著郭台銘確定不選2020，恬娃的記憶庫彷彿也格式化了，改口挺韓，並說「我現在真的擔心韓國瑜選不上」，讓郭家軍傻眼又憤怒。
身為超級郭粉的恬娃過去數月為了郭台銘多次批評韓國瑜，曾經上節目激動說「絕不會投給韓國瑜」，更秀出自己的國民黨證向國民黨主席吳敦義喊話，「韓國瑜現在出來選，最多是250萬票」，但隨著郭董不參選的態勢底定，恬娃前幾天突然跳船改投奔韓國瑜陣營，讓一路支持她的郭家軍盟友超級火大，曾馨瑩堂哥曾惠騰更直接與恬娃決裂，放話「從此不要聯絡了。」
恬娃也表示，本來LINE群有大約20個郭粉群組，前天（1日）卻突然超過半數群組秒刪她，她看著螢幕忍不住痛哭：「就突然成員變成0了，怎麼會這樣？我真的不想活了，我也跟曾惠騰一直道歉…做人好難，真的心裡好難受，他們郭家軍一直說我自打臉，但我現在真的擔心韓國瑜選不上，堂哥（曾惠騰）對不起、對不起，嗚嗚。」
更新時間｜2019.11.03 03:47
text:
恬 改 改 改 改 改 改 改! Annoyed Zeng Xinying’s brother crying, "I was kicked out of Guo Jiajun"
03 Nov 2019, 03:48 by Internet Creative Group, Photography Group
Once a super-Gao powder, she also took the initiative to say that she was going to take a full-naked photo-assisted senior actress, the baby, and she jumped on the boat. She repeatedly publicized the pain of South Korea for Guo Taiming, and also put on the show "He chose me to kneel down." Unexpectedly, as Guo Taiming decided not to choose 2020, the memory of Daiwa’s memory seems to have been formatted as well, and he changed his mouth and said that “I am really worried about the election of South Korea’s Yu”, which makes Guo Jiajun dumbfounded and angry.
In the past few months, he has repeatedly criticized Korean Yu for Guo Taiming. He once said on the show that he will never vote for Korean Yu. He even showed his KMT certificate and shouted to Kuomintang Chairman Wu Dunyi. Now come out to choose, up to 2.5 million votes, but with Guo Dong's non-election situation, the baby suddenly jumped into the South Korean Yu camp a few days ago, so that Guo Jiajun's allies who support her all the way are super fierce, Zeng Xinying The cousin Zeng Huiteng broke off directly with the baby, and said, "Don't contact us."
Zhai also said that there were about 20 Guo powder groups in the LINE group. The day before yesterday (1st), she suddenly deleted more than half of the group seconds. She couldn’t help but cry when she looked at the screen: "Suddenly the member becomes 0, how can this happen? I really don't want to live. I have always apologized with Zeng Huiteng... It’s hard to be a man. It’s really uncomfortable. They Guo Jiajun always said that I’m self-scratching, but I’m really worried about South Korea’s Yu Yu, Tang Ge (Zeng Huiteng) Sorry, sorry, hehe."
Update time|2019.11.03 03:47
